mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_TYPE = 'B' AND REF_NO = BOARD_NO) AS ATTACH_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
